Posts.EditableText:
I want to change the 'a' from the inventory function to a colon, so that instead of:
```
You are carrying a pencils, bulldozer, fridge
```
I get:
```
You are carrying: pencils, bulldozer, fridge
```
Posts.HTML:
I want to change the 'a' from the inventory function to a colon, so that instead of:

You are carrying a pencils, bulldozer, fridge

I get:

You are carrying: pencils, bulldozer, fridge

Posts.EditableText: First you must import the template CarryingListHeader and add the colon. And then remove the "Use default prefix and suffix" option from the pencils object
Posts.HTML: First you must import the template CarryingListHeader and add the colon. And then remove the "Use default prefix and suffix" option from the pencils object

Posts.EditableText: Thank you. That was painless enough.
